title: The Complete PRINCE OF PERSIA Timeline Explained!
description:
The Prince of Persia franchise has a long and storied history, which spans 4 different timelines and 11 games - and that doesn’t even include the 4 separate versions of the Forgotten Sands. With the release of Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown, there is no better time to dive back into the lore and timeline of Ubisoft’s adventure franchise. 

This is the Prince of Persia franchise fully explained.

00:00 - Intro
01:05 - Prince of Persia (1989)
02:27 - Prince of Persia: The Shadow and The Flame
03:53 - Prince of Persia 3D
05:27 - Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
10:06 - Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands
13:05 - Battles of Prince of Persia
14:04 - Prince of Persia: Warrior Within
18:11 - Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones
21:53 - Prince of Persia (2008)
25:52 - Prince of Persia: The Fallen King
26:37 - Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown

From the origins of the series back in Jordan Mechner’s iconic 80s platformer all the way through to the Metroidvania-like The Lost Crown, via the
